attributes.action: abolish the Equality & Human Rights Commission, remove all subsidies to gypsies and travellers and instead redirect these budgets as subsidies to Independent Financial Advisers (IFAs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1. Currently, Independent Financial Advisers (IFAs) are feeling the squeeze in the current economic climate.

2. Independent Financial Advice is very important.  Especially given the increased need for tax-planning so that 69% of potential 50p taxpayers can avoid the charge.

3. The same contribution cannot be said for the Equality & Human Rights Commission. Or travellers.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
